content: these 3d flowers coasters are a unique blend of functional design and artistic detail these round coasters are adorned with two lovely 3d flowers on the edge connected by a charming stem motif that runs through the entire piece the result is a beautiful piece of home decor that will bring a splash of color and a touch of nature to any setting these coasters are not just an accessory they are a statement piece designed to grab attention and spark conversations perfect for gift giving or for adding a personal touch to your living space these crochet coasters are a delightful addition to any crochet collection tools and materials crochet hook 3 5mm yarn lovlim cotton yarn yellow green yarn studio sam and co cotton yarn white scissors needle link to video tutorial https //youtu be/ycinnn5rrwi
